items.label: Identification and Scope
items.description: The title clearly identifies the study as involving AI/ML and indicates the main clinical or methodological scope.

items.label: Study Type and Objectives
items.description: The title reflects the type of study (e.g. development, validation, comparison, implementation) and/or the main objective.

items.label: Evaluation Metrics
items.description: When appropriate, the title anticipates the evaluation focus (e.g. performance comparison, robustness, generalisability).

items.label: Clinical Data Description
items.description: The study provides a clear description of the clinical data, population, and data sources used for AI/ML development.

items.label: Dataset Structure and Splits
items.description: The dataset structure (training/validation/test or cross-validation) and splitting strategy are explicitly reported.
